samples.instruction: Sports quota scholarship Tamil Nadu-la ulladha?
samples.current_output: Sports Development Authority of TN (SDAT) Scholarships: 1) State level players - â‚¹10,000-25,000/year 2) National level - â‚¹25,000-50,000 3) International level - â‚¹1-5 lakh 4) Olympic participants - special pension. College admission: 5% sports quota. Free coaching, equipment, diet allowance. Apply: www.sfrtn.tn.gov.in. Sports certificate from recognized association theva.

samples.instruction: SSC CHSL à®à®©à¯à®© post à®•à®¿à®Ÿà¯ˆà®•à¯à®•à¯à®®à¯? 12th pass-à®•à¯à®•à¯ best option?
samples.current_output: SSC CHSL (Combined Higher Secondary Level): 12th pass Central Govt jobs. Posts: LDC (Lower Division Clerk), DEO (Data Entry Operator), Postal Assistant, Sorting Assistant. Salary: â‚¹20,000-60,000. Exam: Tier 1 (CBT) + Tier 2 (Descriptive). Syllabus: English, Maths, Reasoning, GK. Typing test required. Age: 18-27. Best option for 12th pass - stable central govt job. Apply: www.ssc.nic.in.

samples.instruction: Vellinaadu padippuku ennenna thervugal ezhudha venum?
samples.current_output: Important exams: 1) IELTS/TOEFL - English proficiency 2) GRE - MS/PhD (USA, Canada) 3) GMAT - MBA 4) SAT - UG (USA) 5) PTE - Australia, UK. IELTS: 6.5+ score theva mostly. GRE: 300+ nalla score. Chennai-la pala coaching centers irukku. British Council, IDP IELTS nadathukindrana.

samples.instruction: Evening college-à®²à¯ à®ªà®Ÿà®¿à®•à¯à®•à®²à®¾à®®à®¾? Working people-à®•à¯à®•à¯ option?
samples.current_output: Evening college options: 1) University of Madras evening courses 2) Annamalai University distance + contact 3) IGNOU weekend classes 4) Polytechnic evening batches (limited). Timings: Usually 6-9 PM. Courses: BA, B.Com, BBA, LLB. Benefits: Work + study together, degree = regular degree value. Alternative: Distance education from TNOU, IGNOU - study anytime. Some employers sponsor employee education.

samples.instruction: Govt school-la LKG/UKG-ku admission eppadi? Enna vayasu vendum?
samples.current_output:
**Govt School Admission:**

**Age Rules:**
- LKG: 3+ years (as on June 1)
- UKG: 4+ years
- Class 1: 5+ years

**Admission Time:** May-June

**Documents:**
- Birth Certificate
- Child Aadhaar (optional)
- Parents Aadhaar
- Address proof
- Photos - 4
- Community Certificate

**Where:** School directly or emis.tnschools.gov.in

**Fee:** FREE!

**RTE:** 25% seats in private schools for EWS - Apply at rte.tnschools.gov.in

SHE eligibility: Top 1% in 12th OR KVPY/JEE top 10,000. Apply: www.online-inspire.gov.in.

samples.instruction: Class 8-à®•à¯à®•à¯ à®ªà®¿à®±à®•à¯ à®à®©à¯à®© à®ªà®Ÿà®¿à®•à¯à®•à®²à®¾à®®à¯? à®à®¨à¯à®¤ stream select à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®µà®¤à¯?

samples.instruction: School dropout-à®†à®•à®¿à®µà®¿à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà¯‡à®©à¯, à®ªà®Ÿà®¿à®ªà¯à®ªà¯ˆ continue à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®¯ à®à®©à¯à®© à®µà®´à®¿?
samples.current_output: Options: 1) NIOS (National Institute of Open Schooling) - 10th/12th complete 2) TN State Open School - Tamil medium available 3) Private appearance through Distance Education 4) Skill training + later education. NIOS: www.nios.ac.in, exams twice a year, study at own pace. Age no bar. After 10th/12th: Regular college admission possible. Many successful people are NIOS students.

samples.instruction: Exam day-à®²à¯ sick à®†à®¯à®¿à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà¯‡à®©à¯, alternative option à®‡à®°à¯à®•à¯à®•à®¾?
samples.current_output: Options vary by exam: Board exams - No re-exam, arrear attempt only. Competitive exams - Generally no re-test. College internal - Medical certificate submit, re-test possible. Medical emergency: 1) Get doctor certificate immediately 2) Inform exam authority same day 3) Apply for special consideration. Some exams: PWD/Medical emergency provisions exist. NEET/JEE: One attempt lost, next year continue. Prevention: Health priority before exams, insurance coverage.

samples.instruction: Infosys Foundation scholarship students-ku kidaikkuma?
samples.current_output: Infosys Foundation Programs: 1) Merit scholarships through partner NGOs 2) Rural education support 3) Research grants for PhD students 4) Infosys Prize - established researchers. Direct student scholarship: Through Buddy4Study partner programs. Engineering students: Campus recruitment preference. Apply: Check www.infosys.org annually for specific programs.

samples.instruction: Hall ticket missing, exam-ku poga mudiyumaa?
samples.current_output: Emergency solutions: 1) Download duplicate from exam portal (DigiLocker link) 2) Contact exam centre - they have candidate list 3) Carry Aadhaar + Photo ID as backup 4) School/College principal letter 5) Reach early, explain to centre supervisor. For board exams: School coordinator can help. For competitive exams: Most allow with ID proof + declaration. Prevention: Download multiple copies, keep in phone, email to self. Last resort: Exam board helpline.

samples.instruction: Competitive exam preparation-ku daily routine eppadi irukka venum?
samples.current_output: Ideal routine: 5:00 AM - wake up, fresh topics study (2-3 hrs). 8:00 AM - breakfast, current affairs. 9:00 AM - Practice/mock tests. 12:00 PM - lunch, short rest. 2:00 PM - revision, notes making. 5:00 PM - exercise/break. 6:00 PM - optional subjects. 9:00 PM - light revision, daily news. 10:00 PM - sleep. Weekly: 1 full mock test. Monthly: syllabus completion target vaiyunga.

samples.instruction: Coaching centre-kku anuppanuma, self-study poduma?
samples.current_output: Paiyan/ponnoda learning style paarunga. Self-disciplined-aa irundha self-study + online resources podhum. Otherwise coaching udhavum. Free government coaching (Naan Mudhalvan, TNPSC free coaching) try pannunga mudhalla.

samples.current_output: Status check methods: 1) NSP login - dashboard shows status 2) PFMS portal - payment tracking 3) State portal - respective department 4) SMS alerts (if registered) 5) College scholarship cell. Common statuses: Pending verification, Under process, Sanctioned, Disbursed, Rejected. Rejected: Check defect list, re-apply with correct documents. Timeline: 2-6 months from application. Grievance: Portal helpdesk option.

samples.current_output: Benefits: 1) Government job notifications 2) Seniority based on registration date 3) Free career guidance 4) Skill training opportunities 5) Private job placement 6) Self-employment scheme guidance. Register: District Employment Office with certificates. Renewal: Every year or seniority lost. Documents: Educational certificates, community certificate, Aadhaar. Online renewal available now. Some government jobs require Employment Exchange registration.

samples.instruction: Final year-la irukken. Government job prepare pannanum. Campus placement-a vidalaamaa?
samples.current_output: Don't skip placement! Reasons: 1) Government job = uncertain timeline (1-3 years) 2) Private job = income while preparing 3) Age limit allows both 4) Financial independence. Strategy: Campus placement attend + clear any job â†’ Join â†’ Prepare TNPSC/SSC evenings/weekends â†’ Clear govt exam â†’ Resign â†’ Join government. Many success stories of working professionals clearing exams. Private job experience also valued. Safety net important - family shouldn't struggle while you prepare.

samples.instruction: Board exam-à®²à¯ Re-totalling vs Re-valuation - à®à®©à¯à®© difference?
samples.current_output: Re-totalling: Marks à®•à¯‚à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà¯à®¤à®²à¯ à®®à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà¯à®®à¯ check. Answer sheet re-read à®‡à®²à¯à®²à¯ˆ. Cost: â‚¹50/subject. Time: 10-15 days. Success rate: Low. Re-valuation: Full paper re-evaluation by new examiner. Cost: â‚¹300-500/subject. Time: 30-45 days. Success rate: Higher if genuine mistake. Apply within: 15 days of result. Portal: DGE website. Choose wisely - re-valuation for major doubt only.
